import React from 'react' import { Row,Col,Image,Form,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { UseSelector, useSelector } from 'react-redux/es/hooks/useSelector' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Message from './Message' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FaTrash } from 'react-icons/fa' const cartScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state)=>state.cart); const {cartItems} = cart; return (

{ cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty Go back ): { cartItems.map((item)=> {item.name} ${item.price} { }} > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys() ].map((x)=> )} ) } }
) } export default cartScreen
